alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 09 at 4:08PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT WEDNESDAY... ...REPLACES FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is occurring. * WHERE...Yukon River at Circle. * WHEN...Until 400 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 405 PM AKDT, Observers reported an ice jam on the Yukon River about 6 miles downriver from Circle is causing river levels to rise and flood the access road to the airport at Circle. Flooding of low lying areas at Circle will continue until the ice jam releases. - In addition, a large run of ice is 28 miles upriver of Circle. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Residents near the river should monitor conditions and take the appropriate precautio9ns to protect life and property.
